title: Kuwait
description: After five years of planning and construction and more than three billion dollars in construction costs, one of the world’s longest bridges is complete. Opened in May 2019, the 48-kilometer (30-mile) Sheikh Jaber Al-Ahmad Al-Sabah Causeway is one of the largest construction projects in Kuwait’s history.
